website_summaries.verdict: Shea butter and olive oil are just the ingredients you need to make your skin feel silky and smooth.
cons: Some have said they need to reapply an hour or so later

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a nurse that washes my hands 63782 times a day and this is the BEST lotion EVER and believe me I have tried them all, that being said, you can get the same size tube at Sally’s Beauty Supple for 1/2 the price. If you don’t live close to a Sally’s, then by all means purchase it here, you and your hands and feet will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Christina

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice, mild scent, but not as thick of a cream as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Yokie

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. Wish it was made in a bigger size. Smell isn’t over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy C

customer_reviews.title: Nice cream for hands and skin
customer_reviews.text: I have also used (and really liked) the Silk Elements Shea Butter with Jojoba oil which has a nice fragrance and feels just a little more waxy than the Shea Butter with Olive Oil which has less fragrance and feels like it penetrates the skin easier. BOTH are really nice products!
customer_reviews.author: Nmn

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin; this is great for my hands
customer_reviews.author: Renee' in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed in this hand cream
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in this hand cream. Given the rave reviews I read, I expected it to be more intensely moisturizing and for the effect to last longer. I agree that in sinks into the skin very rapidly, but it doesn't seem rich enough to really help my winter chapped hands.
customer_reviews.author: WendyCat

customer_reviews.title: Little goes a long way for soft-feeling hands!
customer_reviews.text: My hands felt very dry and rough and now softer after use of this hand cream. Only need to use a dab of this hand cream and it goes along way on both hands. Feels very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: When I am running low on this lotion, I immediately order at least 2 more tubes of it. I am in Wisconsin and when the cold air arrives, my hands start getting dry and chapped. This is the best Shea Butter lotion I have found. Works on rough feet, too!
customer_reviews.author: C.K.Designer

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, non- greasy, and it works.
customer_reviews.text: My manicurist gave me some and it works great and that is why I bought more.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and thick but not greasy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hand cream. It is nice and thick but not greasy. A little bit goes a long way. It has a light fragrance that is pleasant and keeps my hand soft for most of the day. I have dry skin and this is really helping. Give it a try, I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: River Runner13

customer_reviews.title: My favorite all time hand lotion
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST hand lotion available. I can’t say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Tube not full, but a good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but felt like my tube was not a full 3 ounces. Expensive product to get shorted on the amount. Would expect to get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Not greasy & lasts after washing your hands
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Not greasy & lasts after washing your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Really good hand cream. .
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, makes your hands soft and moisturizes well, however, I'm not all that fond of the scent. I do use it though because it is an affective hand cream!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy55

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hand cream
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cream. Non greasy, soaks in and keeps your hands moist even after washing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered multiple tubes of this hand lotion. There isn't a strong smell, and the lotion isn't sticky. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: good size tube
customer_reviews.text: silky smooth results...and you only need a little bit...good size tube...pleasant fresh non heavy smell
customer_reviews.author: pingsum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent softness, moisture
customer_reviews.text: Excellent softness, moisture, and hydration !! If my hands are skin-cracked and very dry for many days, all it takes is 2 or 3 applications of this creme and BAMM !! Dryness is LONG GONE !
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling hand cream
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It smells awesome and is not greasy but you can feel the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: L Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells nice, not too much perfume. Its great in my guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scent is over bearing but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Hand lotion
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Really does a great job on my dry hands! I highly recommend it to anyone who has dry skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherman660

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hand cream ever - not too greasy, yet lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product my hands feel like silk after a week
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: get this nowwww
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse who has extremely dry hands from over-washing, this is THE BEST. non-greasy & leaves hands soft and the smell is soft and fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Demitra

customer_reviews.title: Not how picture shows
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed. I saw some buyers that had this in plastic. This buyer showed it as my original one I bought in the store in a silver tube. Looked nicer. This looked like cheap plastic. I was staying optimistic. This is a favorite great smelling lotion of mine. It looks like a knock off. Even though all wording is the same. I put it on. Right away didn't like it. The smell is different. Not what I'd wear around. Also made me sneeze. Big disappointment. I put my old one what was left on. It smells completely different and doesn't have the same feel. Extremely disappointed. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Girl born & raised

customer_reviews.title: A Dry Skin Cure for sure but SMELLY
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is the best for putting back moisture in very dry skin, but the smell is a bit gagging. It's a horrible plastic smell that stays with you for a while. The lotion is the BEST there is, but the SMELL is the worse there is! Can't the manufacturer do better than that?
customer_reviews.author: Elle Pea

customer_reviews.title: I just HATE it. And being a hand cream
customer_reviews.text: I can't get past the cheap fragrance. I just HATE it. And being a hand cream, invariably the smell wafts up to my nose on a regular basis. On the tube it says "fresh, light fragrance" which is what you would expect from Shea Butter and olive oil. To me the smell is not mild and natural but offensive. Will have to give it away or throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Krikava

customer_reviews.title: Hand lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this lotion makes my hands feel. It's very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice upon application and soaks into skin quickly but leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice upon application and soaks into skin quickly but leaves it feeling dry an hour or so later. Not worth the price. Pleasant smell though.
customer_reviews.author: s0shummy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this lotion, and it is not greasy feeling. I have ordered this several times and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: T. White

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice, effective cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, effective cream. I have dry skin and have been using L'Annine brand but that's become very hard to get. This is just as good and less pricey.
customer_reviews.author: MT138

customer_reviews.title: Really like it, but would be nice to have it ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like it, but would be nice to have it available in smaller size, kinda large for a purse
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cream. It is thick and rich and absorbs quickly. This is my second time buying and it won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great hand cream
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product and works wonderfully on dry hands, elbows.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: great hand cream
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best of all worlds for the hands and more. It is especially handy as it is a 3 oz tube making it easy to board planes with and is handy for everything when you travel.
customer_reviews.author: egold

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with moisturizing and even healing. I personally don't like the way it smells, but at least it's not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: MsMeow56

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like this, no greasy feeling, and long lasting. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: dre

customer_reviews.title: Scent unpleasantly strong
customer_reviews.text: Scent very strong and unpleasant. Otherwise feels nice but will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hobart

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lotion! It smells light and delicious, and isn't too oily. This was an easy 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: DavCar

customer_reviews.title: BEST HAND CREAM EVER.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST HAND CREAM EVER. I HAVE REALLY DRY SKIN AND THIS LEAVES MY SKIN SILKY SOFT WITHOUT FEELING GREASY. I WILL ORDER AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE BECK

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: In four days my eczema had dramatically improved! The scent is light and clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GPS

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, nothing great. Certainly Not a Substitute for the Real Thing -
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in place of the L'Occitane Shea Butter hand cream that costs three times as much. While this cream is okay, I eventually went back and purchased the L'Occitane. Nothing really wrong with this cream, it does an okay job for not too much money, but it's just not the same. Pleasant smell, non-greasy too.
customer_reviews.author: birdmom9726

product_meta.title: Silk Elements Shea Butter & Olive Oil Hand Cream
product_meta.description: Silk Elements Shea Butter with Olive Oil Hand Cream is a luxurious, rich formula that deeply penetrates the skin and absorbs quickly. This hand cream leaves hands silky soft and ultra-moisturized non-greasy with a fresh, light fragrance.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
